name: Tik-Tok of Oz
summary: Betsy Bobbin, a girl from Oklahoma, is shipwrecked with her mule, Hank, in the Rose Kingdom of Oz. She meets the Shaggy Man there and the two try to rescue the Shaggy Man's brother from the Nome King. This book is partly based upon Baum's stage musical, The Tik-Tok Man of Oz, which was in turn based on Ozma of Oz.
info:
• 中文名: 奥兹国的嘀嗒机器人
  • 作者: Lyman Frank Baum
  • 别名: オズのチクタク
  • 别名: 奥芝国的嘀嗒-嘀嗒
  • 别名: 欧兹的机器人
  • 出版社: Reilly & Britton
  • 发售日: 1914年
  • 插画: John R. Neill
